Title: Microsoft.DwayneNeed
Description: Samples and reusable code for accomplishing interesting scenarios in WPF.  In depth discussions of these topics can be found on my blog, at [url:http://blogs.msdn.com/DwayneNeed].
HomeWiki:
This project contains samples and reusable code for accomplishing interesting scenarios in WPF. All of the samples will (eventually) be included in the single DemoApp click-once download.

Currently, this project demonstrates
  1. Rendering UI on multiple threads.
  2. Snapping bitmaps to the pixel grid.
  3. Writing a customize bitmap source.
  4. Decoding IEEE floating point numbers.
  5. Mitigating "airspace" issues in WPF applications.

In depth discussions of these topics can be found on my blog, at http://blogs.msdn.com/DwayneNeed.
